title: Billy Haywood
text: Johnson William Haywood (11 April 1899–1977) was an English <a href="association%20football">footballer</a> who played in the <a href="English%20Football%20League">Football League</a> for <a href="Barrow%20A.F.C.">Barrow</a>, <a href="Chelsea%20F.C.">Chelsea</a> and <a href="Halifax%20Town%20A.F.C.">Halifax Town</a>.
